testsuite.title: Compliance test suite for Web Map Tile Service (WMTS) 1.0 Server
testsuite.description: Verifies that a Web Map Tile Service (WMTS) implementation comnforms to the relevant specifications: OpenGIS Web Map Tile Service Implementation Standard, Version 1.0.0 (OGC 07-057r7). The test run arguments are summarized in the following table. The obligation descriptor can have the following values: M (mandatory), O (optional), or C (conditional).

testrunargument.name: capabilities-url
testrunargument.description: A URI that refers to the implementation under test or metadata about it. Ampersand ('&') characters must be percent-encoded as '%26'.
